forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of drizzle and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a low around 40. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of drizzle and patchy fog before 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 55. Southeast wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As morning dawns quietly over Boston, a gentle drizzle accompanies the veil of patchy fog, hinting at a day that unfolds with a graceful unease. The air is cool, caressing the skin with its dampness, perfect for those who appreciate the solace found in a muted palette of cloudy skies. You might feel inclined to wear a light sweater or a thin jacket, perhaps with an umbrella in hand, as the east wind whispers through the city, barely stirring the leaves of early spring.

The forecast nudges us toward a mostly cloudy but mild afternoon, where the temperature will climb to a modest warmth. It is a day best enjoyed at a slower pace; perhaps a stroll through the historic streets, seeking shelter in a cozy café to savor the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee while gazing out as the world drips and moves in grey hues. Alternatively, the quietude of home may call—an ideal setting for reading or perhaps catching up on a leisurely hobby, while the soft patter of drizzle becomes the soundtrack of contemplation. As the hours pass, take a moment to appreciate the subtle beauty of a city cloaked in mist; it holds a charm all its own, inviting you to pause and appreciate life in its quieter moments.
